title: Jane Austen's Emma
brief_description: Kate Beckinsale plays Emma, one of Jane Austen’s most beloved heroines. On her way to true love with Mr. Knightly (Mark Strong), Emma becomes involved in matchmaking, romantic intrigue and learns a valuable lesson about interfering in the lives of others. Co-starring Samantha Morton as Harriet, Bernard Hepton as Mr. Woodhouse and Prunella Scales as the garrulous Miss Bates.
